citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany the APHIS Official during the inspection process at 1:00pm on
October 31, 2024. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee by knocking on the door and calling the phone
numbers on file for this licensee. The inspector waited approximately 30 minutes before leaving the facility. Failure to
provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure
to comply may result in enforcement action.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany the APHIS Official during the inspection process at 1:00pm on 
October 31, 2024. The inspector attempted to contact the licensee by knocking on the door and calling the phone 
numbers on file for this licensee. The inspector waited approximately 30 minutes before leaving the facility. Failure to 
provide access to the facility, animals, and records for inspection is a serious violation of the AWA and regulations. Failure 
to comply may result in enforcement action. 
 
 
End Section
